title: Facebook's iOS app uses 3D Touch to make short work of status updates
text:
Facebook's iOS app uses 3D Touch to make short work of status updates 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
When you find yourself needing to post to Facebook quickly, the social network's app leverages iOS 9 to do just that. Thanks to the newfangl...
